name: Space Rover
description:
Humans always aims for new discoveries. Their curiosity drives them further into space. You are in charge of a space rover. The comet on which you landed, might have chemical elements known on earth. Find 3 different samples and report back to NASA. But be careful to not run out of power, you can recharge your battery only in the sunlight

Controls:
WSAD/Arrows- driving
Space - collect sample
R - report back to NASA.
ESC - close game

Ludum Dare 39  entry, theme "Running out of Power": https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/space-rover
